mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings (user_id, business_day_slot_id, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{businessDaySlotId}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT tsm.id AS timeSlotId, tsm.label AS timeLabel, u.name AS patientName, u.card_number AS cardNumber, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM business_days bd INNER JOIN business_day_slots bds ON bd.id = bds.business_day_id INNER JOIN time_slot_master tsm ON bds.time_slot_master_id = tsm.id LEFT JOIN bookings b ON b.business_day_slot_id = bds.id AND b.status = 'reserved' LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE bd.business_date = #{date} ORDER BY tsm.id
